Description:
Period sanctuary with modern appeal
This cherished, immaculately maintained double brick, two storey fully airconditioned Californian Bungalow, which was extended in 1999, has been beautifully looked after inside & out, & has enjoyed family ownership for over six decades. Showcasing high decorative ceilings, glistening lead light windows & doors, ornate decorative fireplaces with natural gas furnaces & polished hardwood timber floors, this period treasure presents a wonderful blend of original features alongside modern comforts & a stylish extension & offers superb scope to update & further enhance (STCA) & is sure to interest many. With a picture perfect façade, sitting proudly on a substantial 715m2* allotment with a warm welcoming ambience, it comprises a large beautifully manicured front garden, wide entrance hall, elegant formal lounge & dining room, spacious timber kitchen with walk in pantry & an abundance of storage overlooking a casual living & dining zone with doors out to an Merbau decking external covered entertainment area, with natural gas connected barbecue, heated swim spa with electrically controlled louvre covering & a picturesque, lushly landscaped rear garden sanctuary - the perfect spot to escape from it all. A spacious guest bedroom, bedroom/study, bathroom & laundry complete the ground level. Upstairs reveals a generously proportioned master bedroom with walk-in robe & ensuite, two additional generously sized bedrooms with built-in robes, a central bathroom with separate toilet & a handy landing retreat with built-in-robes. Other attributes include a double lock up garage with access to rear, extensive security systems including an alarm & security cameras with call-to-base & connected to recording facility, ducted vacuuming throughout, substantial storage plus storage shed, 3000 L water tanks, split system heating/cooling, motorised sun blinds, irrigation system & timed watering system. Ideally located within the Caulfield South Primary School zone, close to Glen Huntly Road shops, transport & parklands. *Approximate Title Dimensions.

Impeccably presented, deceptively spacious, and showcasing all the sweet serenity of a rear standalone setting, this single-level 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom town residence leaves nothing to chance with irresistible natural light flowing through every wide-reaching space.
